OCD.name: SslManagerService
OCD.description: The SslManagerService is responsible to manage the configuration of the SSL connections.

AD.name: ssl.default.protocol
AD.description: The protocol to use to initialize the SSLContext. If not specified, the default JVM SSL Context will be used.

AD.name: KeystoreService Target Filter
AD.description: Specifies, as an OSGi target filter, the pid of the KeystoreService used to manage the HTTPS Keystore.

AD.name: ssl.default.cipherSuites
AD.description: Comma-separated list of allosed ciphers. If not specifed, all Java VM ciphers will be allowed.

AD.name: Revocation Check Enabled
AD.description: Specifies whether to check revocation status of server certificates.

AD.name: Revocation Check Mode
AD.description: Specifies the mode for performing revocation check.

AD.name: Revocation Soft-fail Enabled
AD.description: Specifies whether the revocation soft fail is enabled or not. If it is not enabled and the gateway is not able verify the revocation status of a server certificate, the certificate will be rejected.
